> Lesser Summoning Air

> combine the spell it lists as one of the ingredients. However I asked a
> few people that told me you just need to have the
> spell WRITTEN in your spellbook in order to create the next level version
> of it. Is this true? And is this the same with the necro/wiz/enchanter
